creator: kl@vsen.dk
text:
I am trying to find the cause of random segfaults on our servers, and am looking at using log_forensic at this looks to be exactly what I need.

Only thing is - that in my error_log I have the PID of the process that segfaulted - and instead of the current approach - where I need to look at the forensic log and figure out (using the support tool) which requests didn't finish, it would be so much easier if the forensic log contained a timestamp and the PID of the process the request has been assigned to.
